title: Moving mouse in game causes FPS drops
body: I can sit perfectly still and have 120-150 fps, if i try to move my mouse literally at all, i go down to 10-30. the more movement the longer it stays low fps. i can click on the map and toggle the camera lock on and have great fps, so long as i never move my mouse. drivers up to date disabled the snowdown etc etc ive tried everything whats the deal riot

replies.body:
Your settings could be corrupt and causing issues like this.  See if a config reset might help here and let me know:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
I am also having this issue ... only happened since 7.24b update.
